mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${tableName} ( playlist_name VARCHAR(512) comment 'playlist name', track_name VARCHAR(512) comment 'track name', artist_name VARCHAR(512) comment 'artist name', album_name VARCHAR(512) comment 'album name', track_uri VARCHAR(64) comment 'track uri', added_date DATE comment 'added date', # PRIMARY KEY (playlist_name, track_uri), index idx_playlist_name(playlist_name), index idx_track_uri(track_uri) ) collate = utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ${tableName} (playlist_name, track_name, artist_name, album_name, track_uri, added_date) VALUES
(#{item.playlistName}, #{item.trackName}, #{item.artistName}, #{item.albumName}, #{item.trackUri}, #{item.addedDate})
mapper.select: SELECT p.playlist_name AS playlist_name, AVG(s.danceability) AS danceability, AVG(s.energy) AS energy, AVG(s.loudness) AS loudness, AVG(s.liveness) AS liveness, AVG(s.valence) AS valence, AVG(s.tempo) AS tempo FROM ${tableName} AS p JOIN song_features AS s ON p.track_uri = s.track_uri GROUP BY p.playlist_name
